title: [Large-scale] Constructivist-based Chemistry Concept Understanding and Expression Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemical terminology and interest in everyday chemical phenomena
context.additional_context: A course where in-service elementary teachers acquire expressive methods to effectively convey chemistry concepts connected to real-life contexts

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three expression techniques (gestures, physical models, digital tools) to explain the structure and properties of chemical substances.
Learners can produce and explain 2â€“3-minute vlogs describing the structure-property relationships of molecules/materials related to everyday chemical phenomena.
Learners can revise and improve vlog content at least twice based on peer feedback, achieving over 80% accuracy in structural explanations for the final project submission.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
